narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The applicant wishes to be licensed by USDA with a new Class A - Breeder's license.
The applicant will submit all license applicable fees to the USDA-APHIS-AC Regional Office in Fort Collins,
Colorado for processing.  The mailing address where the applicant needs to submit the license fees is as follows:
     United States Department of Agriculture
     Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service
     Animal Care
     Marketing & Regulatory Program Business Services
     2150 Centre Avenue
     Building B, 3W11
     Fort Collins, CO 80526
No USDA regulated activities are permitted at the premises until the USDA license is issued and received by the
applicant.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with two facility representatives.
